title: Find the Missing Shipment
content: men you saved invited you to their hideout. If you lockpick (DC 20) the caravan strongbox, inside would be some gold and the artifact the Iron Flask. Removing the stopper summons a Spectator. DOING THIS WILL LOCK YOU OUT OF FRIENDLY INTERACTIONS WITH THE ZHENTARIM AND POSSIBLY ITS CLIENT (Described as a famous and powerful wizard in Baldur's Gate) The hideout is at Waukeen's Rest, in a wine cellar. To get in there, you need to persuade Salazon, or use the password given by caravaneers. Enter the
